text:
e="preserve">Dumiso Dabengwa (December 6, 1939– 23 May 2019) was a Zimbabwean politician. He was the head of Zimbabwe People's Revolutionary Army (ZIPRA) intelligence during the Rhodesian Bush War. He was Minister of Home Affairs from 1992 to 2000. He was a candidate of ZAPU for President of Zimbabwe during the 2013 general election.
Dabengwa died on 23 May 2019 in Harare from liver disease at the age of 79.
